vote.title: Authorize a three-year service contract, with three one-year renewal options, for the collection of delinquent fines and fees for violations of City ordinances, traffic, and state laws, excluding parking violations - Linebarger Goggan Blair & Sampson, LLP, most advantageous proposer of four - Estimated Annual Gross Revenue: $7,891,666.67 - General Fund ($4,937,991.00), Technology Fund ($184,139.00), Security Fee Fund ($138,104.34), Juvenile Case Manager Fund ($110,483.33), Dallas Tomorrow Fund ($153,449.00), and Special Contract Collection Fund ($2,367,500.00) (see Fiscal Information)
